page.title: 05EDUCATION
page.content: EDUCATION There are more children under the age of six than of secondary school age children. The under nines attend St.Mary's Catholics infants school which is 2 Km away from this area or they attend Brewood County Infants which is also 2 Km away. Nearly all the 9-13 year olds attend Brewood Middle or St. Dominics Independent School for girls,which are both 2Km away. People above the age of 13 nearly all attend Wolgarston Comprehensive which is 11\ Km away. People above the age of 16 are either in employment or attend Stafford College which is 20 Km away from the area.
